section.title: By Commit Statistics

table.title: Contributors by number of authored commits(1), lines added/removed(2)

section.para: (1) including any documentation-related commits, excluding merge commits. Regarding imported patches/code, we try our best to count the work on behalf of the proper owner, as per the "fix_authors" array in opensips/doc/build-contrib.sh. If you identify any patches/commits which should be counted towards your email address, rather than the importers' email address, please submit a pull request which extends the "fix_authors" array.

para.emphasis: (2) ignoring whitespace fixes and auto-generated files
(3) DevScore = author_commits + author_lines_added / (project_lines_added / project_commits) + author_lines_deleted / (project_lines_deleted / project_commits)

table.title: Contributors by first/last commits(1) into this module

para.emphasis: (1) including any documentation-related commits, excluding merge commits
